actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Benzamide,3,3'[(2-chloro-5-methyl-1,4-phenylene)bis[imino=(1 acety-2-oxo-2,1-ethanediyl)azo}}bis(4-chloro-N-(3-chloro-2- methyphenyl)).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified dye.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Benzamide,3,3'[(2-chloro-5-methyl-1,4-phenylene)bis[imino=(1 acety-2-oxo-2,1-ethanediyl)azo}}bis(4-chloro-N-(3-chloro-2- methyphenyl)).
